name: Dance at Sunset
descHash:
In the resplendent twilight, a swift figure darts across the rooftops.

"Lili, Guoguo, let's see who makes it to the finish line first!"
Scaling the eaves, evading the guards, swaying with the wind, the girl moves like a nimble critter, chasing the last sliver of sunlight.

The warm evening breeze caresses her face, and the setting sun bathes the cat in a kaleidoscope of colors.
"You guys won!"
She declares, wiping sweat from her brow and cradling the cat in her arms.
Amidst a rising galaxy of stars, her unguarded smile dissolves into a bloom of innocence, akin to the layered twilight hues adrift in the sky.

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

549503.name: Artifex's Module
549503.desc: Components used in Xianzhou's ingenium creations. Crude material used for enhancement.
549503.lore:
The foundation of Xianzhou's ingenium technology. The smallest constituent of all machine parts. Breaking it apart would be akin to destroying the cellular structure of a living being.

"The Intelligentsia Guild put up a bounty of two million credits for technical plans that can flawlessly disassemble Xianzhou mechanical puppets."
"If you know Screwllum, then these two millions are basically yours to take..."
comeFrom: Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

633444.name: Artifex's Cogwheel
633444.desc: Parts of the Xianzhou machines. Normal material used for enhancement.
633444.lore:
The connective components used in Xianzhou's ingenium technology. The intricate and thin teeth of the cogwheels are as minute as mustard seeds, and yet are interconnected to form a complex body, making the machine able to pass as true life.

"Its form lies in harmony, a parallel to nature. Its movements cyclical, echoing the cosmos."
comeFrom: Entranced Ingenia at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

635680.name: Borisin Teeth
635680.desc: Broken teeth fragments left behind during the borisin conquests. Used to level up Traces slightly for Destruction characters.
635680.lore:
Borisin consider their teeth as a warrior's blade and weapon.
The borisin worship warriors possessing supreme power. In their tribes, where the strong rule the weak, those with dental caries will only be discarded by the group.

"O, Brood Lord, grant us sharp teeth and claws."

694487.name: Refined Aether
694487.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>6000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694487.lore:
A canister of aether that has been extracted and distilled using special procedures.

"The Garden looks forward to recreating a past glory, but it is a 'past glory' selected by them. Do you understand?"

694488.name: Condensed Aether
694488.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>2000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694488.lore:
A can of Aether refined through special techniques.

"Handle with care, do not drop or place pressure upon it. If damages and leaks occur, please refer to chapter II of the Leak Disaster Response Manual for emergency response."

694489.name: Sparse Aether
694489.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>500</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694489.lore:
An imaginary substance that shouldn't exist in reality. The basic material to create Light Cones.
The images contained in the Light Cones become clearer when infused with this substance.

"I see, so this is the supposed 'memoria' of the Garden of Recollection. No wonder the Memokeepers can set off on galactic voyages with memories."

717385.name: Artifex's Gyreheart
717385.desc: Components used in Xianzhou's ingenium creations. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717385.lore:
The core of Xianzhou's ingenium technology. The armillary sphere roils and vibrates like the essence of a heart, making the machine think like a living being.

"Do not be startled. Taking away its heart would make him... her?... No, make it lose its sentience and return to its mechanical sources."
comeFrom: Entranced Ingenia at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

836266.name: Moon Rage Fang
836266.desc: Terrifying tusks left behind during the borisin conquests. Used to level up Traces significantly for Destruction characters.
836266.lore:
Borisin can further enhance their bodies through their innate "Moon Rage."
The battle-frenzied warriors exhibit incredible healing abilities, shedding the blood of their enemies in a sanguine mist together with the unbridled growth of their muscles and bones.

"O, Brood Lord, grant us divine strength."

920207.name: Lupitoxin Sawteeth
920207.desc: Blood-sucking sharp fangs left behind during the borisin conquests. Used to level up Traces moderately for Destruction characters.
920207.lore:
Borisin consider their teeth as a warrior's blade and weapon.
A maddening impulse flows through the borisin blood. Fueled by Lupitoxin, they rend their enemies with their sawteeth and suck their blood, and are undefeated.

"O, Brood Lord, grant us steel skin and bones."

skill.name: Deeply Engrossed
skill.descHash: Greatly increases the wearer's chance of getting attacked and increases CRIT DMG by #1[i]%. After the wearer uses Ultimate, receives 1 stack of Firedance, lasting for 2 turns and stacking up to #2[i] time(s). Each stack of Firedance increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attack by #3[i]%.
